TextView.android:text: Shopship Mobile Orders Management App’s Products and Service Terms and Conditions

Shopship is a an order management for dropship. Shopship promotes mobile commerce services for communities willing to earn money or side income (are referred to as dropships). Shopship company fully owns the intellectual property rights of the Shopship system. This letter is to notify the sellers on the Shopship Mobile Order Management App’s Product and Service Terms and Conditions, charges and rates that incur to the dropships, as dropship register with the Shopship. One of the key strengths of Cashierbook system is its integrated data privacy mechanism and most trusted and secured app.
Shopship Mobile Orders Management’s Products and Service Terms and Conditions

1. On the hopship Mobile Orders’s payment management, all buyers can pay their purchases using either bank transfer, PayPal, credit card or debit card through iPay88 payment gateway service. 

 2. The dropships of Shopship system are solely responsible for any actions that they performed on the Shopship system according to the Malaysian law. Shopship company will not be liable for any illegal activities performed by the sellers in the Shopship system. 

 3. For items listed in the Shopship system, when dropship make a purchase of the listed item, Shopship company will not charge an administration fee. On the delivery services, a delivery charge of RM10 per item will be imposed on the dropships. 

 4. All items’ size is limit to no more than “A4” size and should be weight less than 2kg. Any items that are more than “A4” and weight more than 2kg will be charged on a case-to-case basis for the transporting fee. Sellers are required to indicate on the Shopship Mobile App.

5. In case of dropships wants to return any items to the item’s supplier, dropships need to return the purchased items to the respective supplier’s physical shop by themselves without going through Shopship system. Shopship system will not process any transaction and activity related to the return item event. 


6. Shopship company reserved the right to reject any item(s) in the dropship’s order if the sellers cannot deliver the buyer’s requested item(s) to the Shopship item collection (pick-up) counter within the time frame that specified by the Shopship system. 

 7. Shopship company reserved the rights to review and change the mentioned terms and conditions in this letter at any given time and conditions without further reference to the tenants and dropships. 


8. If dropship had made his or her payment after purchased item at Shopship system and then admin of Shopship cancel order due to any reason. Hence, admin of Shopship will absorb the transaction fee lost occurred from the dropship’s transaction. 


9. Shopship HQ and dropships agreed to authorize WWM management and Shopship company to view and use the data from Shopship system. 

 Sho[ship team looks forward to work together with you to bring your business’s sales performance to the next level with Shopship’s services.
